backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for a dental clinic app defining types and CRUD operations for appointments, reviews, doctors, services, and user profiles, with role-based access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented feature IDs to their titles, affected source files, component dependencies, and test IDs for the dental clinic frontend.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted text file containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a build/planning reference for the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA titled 'XYZ Dental Clinic' that mounts the app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all public and admin routes, wraps the app in QueryClientProvider and ThemeProvider, and renders global UI like ScrollProgressBar and LiquidGradientBackground.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that checks sessionStorage for an 'adminAuth' flag and redirects unauthenticated users to the home page, showing an access-denied message in the meantime.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundPartic: Canvas-free animated background component that spawns floating dental emoji particles using requestAnimationFrame, managing their lifecycle, opacity fade, and cleanup on unmount.
frontend/src/components/BeforeAfterSlide: A React component that renders a draggable before/after image comparison slider with three static dental treatment pairs (whitening, braces, smile makeover), supporting both mouse and touch interactions.
frontend/src/components/BookAppointmentD: A modal dialog component for booking dental appointments, with a form collecting patient name, contact info, preferred date, and service type, showing a success state upon submission via the useBookAppointment hook.
frontend/src/components/ClinicStatusBann: Displays a top banner when the clinic is closed or in emergency-only mode, with color-coded styling and appropriate messaging fetched via useGetClinicStatus.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Renders a contact information section with cards for phone, email, address, and hours, plus a WhatsApp CTA button, using a staggered text reveal animation on the heading.
frontend/src/components/CustomCursor.tsx: A stub component for a custom cursor that is currently disabled, returning null to defer to the native OS cursor.
frontend/src/components/DoctorProfile.ts: Displays a profile section for Dr. Priya Sharma including her photo, bio, key stats (patients, experience, satisfaction), and specialty tags, with a staggered heading animation.
frontend/src/components/FloatingDentalEl: Renders fixed, low-opacity floating dental icon images (tooth, toothbrush, mirror, plus) in the background with a bobbing CSS animation, purely decorative and pointer-events disabled.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A site footer with brand info, quick links, services list, and contact details, plus a hidden admin login modal triggered from within the footer.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed navigation header that turns opaque on scroll, with smooth-scroll nav links, a mobile menu toggle, and a 'Book Appointment' button that opens a dialog.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-viewport hero section with a background image, animated floating dental icons, staggered text reveal heading, and a call-to-action button that opens the booking dialog.
frontend/src/components/HiddenAdminLogin: Modal dialog with hardcoded credential validation that stores admin auth in sessionStorage and navigates to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/components/LiquidGradientBa: Canvas-based animated background that renders a mouse-reactive liquid gradient with animated radial color blobs using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout, showing loading state and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/MagneticButton.t: Wrapper component that applies a magnetic hover effect by translating its child element toward the cursor position on mouse move.
frontend/src/components/ScrollProgressBa: Fixed top progress bar that fills horizontally based on the user's scroll position through the page.
frontend/src/components/ServicesGrid.tsx: Grid section displaying dental services fetched from the backend (with static fallback), each card navigating to a service detail page on click with hover glow effects.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialCarou: Renders an auto-scrolling infinite carousel of patient testimonials with star ratings, using requestAnimationFrame for smooth animation and a staggered text reveal for the section heading.
frontend/src/components/TypewriterText.t: A component that animates text with a typewriter effect character-by-character once the element scrolls into view, using the useScrollReveal hook.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Displays a modal dialog prompting newly authenticated users to enter their name and create a profile, blocking dismissal until the profile is saved.
frontend/src/components/ZoomInImage.tsx: Wraps an image with a scroll-triggered zoom-in and fade-in animation using the useScrollReveal hook.
frontend/src/context/CursorContext.tsx: Provides a React context for tracking and updating a cursor icon state ('default' or 'dental') across the app without hiding the native cursor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) via React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlassmorphismRevea: An IntersectionObserver hook that sets isVisible to true once the referenced element crosses a configurable threshold, intended for glassmorphism reveal animations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status through a React context and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for the app's backend actor, covering appointments, reviews, services, doctors, clinic status, before/after images, and user profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: A generic IntersectionObserver hook that returns a ref and isVisible boolean, triggering once when the element enters the viewport at a given threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaggeredTextRevea: Splits a string into words and returns per-word inline styles that stagger a fade-and-slide-up animation when the referenced element scrolls into view.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextScramble.ts: Animates text with a scramble effect on scroll-into-view, progressively resolving random characters to the target string over ~1 second using setInterval.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter and Playfair Display fonts, sets up Tailwind, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using oklch colors, and declares keyframe animations (floatBob, scrollPulse, successPop, etc.) plus scroll-reveal utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, mounting it to the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: A full-page access denied screen with a shield icon and a button that navigates back to the home route, styled with inline CSS.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Appointments.ts: Admin page that lists all patient appointments with status filtering and the ability to update appointment statuses, fetched via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/BeforeAfterMana: Admin page for uploading before/after image pairs with drag-and-drop support, upload progress tracking, and a description field, stored via ExternalBlob.
Admin page with a form to submit patient reviews (name, text, star rating) that are saved in a pending state awaiting approval.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Dashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page displaying navigation cards for all admin sections (appointments, services, reviews, etc.) and a clinic status toggle (open/closed/emergency) with logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DoctorScheduler: Admin page for adding new doctors (name and specialty) and listing existing doctors, using React Query hooks for data fetching and mutation.
Admin moderation page that lists pending patient reviews and allows approving or deleting them, displaying reviewer name, star rating, text, and optional photo.
Admin CMS page for editing a predefined list of dental services, allowing updates to display name, description, and featured photo with upload progress tracking.
Detail page for the Dental Implants service featuring a hero section with an image, a benefits grid, and a BookAppointmentDialog triggered by a 'Book Now' button.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Main landing page that composes all major sections (Hero, Services, Doctor Profile, Before/After, Testimonials, Contact) each wrapped in a scroll-reveal animation component.
frontend/src/pages/InvisalignDetail.tsx: Detail page for the Invisalign service with a hero section, an embedded BeforeAfterSlider, a benefits grid, and a BookAppointmentDialog triggered by a 'Book Now' button.
Detail page for the Laser Dentistry service featuring a dark hero with a decorative laser-beam element, a benefits section, and a BookAppointmentDialog triggered by a 'Book Now' button.
frontend/src/pages/PediatricDentistryDet: Detail page for the Pediatric Dentistry service with a green-themed hero, a 'Why Kids Love Us' features grid, and a BookAppointmentDialog triggered by a 'Book Now' button.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetail.tsx: Displays a detail page for a specific dental service fetched by serviceId, showing a featured photo, description, feature highlights, and a booking dialog trigger.
frontend/src/pages/SmileMakeoverDetail.t: Static detail page for the Smile Makeover service featuring a hero section, before/after slider, and a list of included treatments with a booking dialog.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing helper functions to read, store, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors (teal, royal-blue, CSS variable-based semantic colors), fonts, border radii, box shadows, keyframe animations (mesh gradient, float bob, accordion), and plugins for animate and typography.
project_state.json: Tracks the dental clinic website project state at version 3, listing existing features (appointment booking fix, hero float animation, magnetic buttons, staggered text reveal, liquid gradient background, scroll progress bar, admin panel) along with architectural notes and known issues.
